Key Match Events: Ecuador's Enner Valencia was sent off with a red card after a VAR check for a chest high kick on Jose Martinez
Post-Match Reflections: Chelsea's new signing Kendry Paez showed his potential and ability to be a top player in the world football
Miscellaneous Highlights: Venezuela recorded their first win against Ecuador at a Copa since 2011
Others: Kendry Paez will move to Chelsea in England when he turns 18 in May 2025, after Chelsea concluded a transfer for him in June 2023, paying a rumored $12.5 million to Ecuadorian club Independiente del Valle
